import clsx from 'clsx'

import { HTMLAttributes } from 'react'

import styles from './styles.module.css'


interface HeadingProps extends HTMLAttributes<HTMLDivElement> <BODY HeadingProps>

const Heading = ({

  as: Element = 'h2',

  className,

  style,

  font = 'interface',

  size = 'base',

  children,

  ...rest

}: HeadingProps) => <BODY Heading>

interface ParagraphProps extends HTMLAttributes<HTMLParagraphElement> <BODY ParagraphProps>

const Paragraph = ({

  className,

  style,

  size = 'sm',

  color = 'secondary',

  lineHeight = 'tight',

  children,

  ...rest

}: ParagraphProps) => <BODY Paragraph>

export const Typography = {

  Heading,

  Paragraph,

}
